message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,500. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down slightly, but $10,800 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,100?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go up to $11,000. Can you consider that?
